schema.description: Ends the ongoing sale by completing `limit` number of operations depending on if the minimum number of tokens was sold.
schema.title: End sale

alerts.text: If the sale meets the minimum number of tokens required to be sold, the tokens are sent to the buyers and the funds to the recipient
If the sale does not meet the minimum number of tokens required to be sold, refunds are sent to the buyers, and the tokens are burned

ui:options.title: Crowdfund Token Limit
ui:options.description: An optional limit on the number of transferred tokens in case the sale was a success, or the number of refunds to issue in case the sale did not succeed (min amount not reached).
